title: Kill Zone Quality Heatmap
prompt: Create a weekly heatmap grid showing optimal trading hours. 7 rows for days (Monday-Friday active, Saturday-Sunday grayed). 24 columns for hours (00:00-23:00 UTC). Cell colors indicate quality: Dark green (#059669) for 'Excellent' (overlap hours), Light green (#10B981) for 'Good' (London/NY sessions), Yellow (#FBBF24) for 'Okay' (Asian session), Gray (#374151) for 'Skip' (off-hours). Red (#DC2626) for 'No Trade' (Friday evening). Include legend at bottom. Highlight current hour with glowing border. Add row labels (days) on left, column labels (hours) on top. Dark background (#111827). Include volatility indicator icons (high/medium/low) in key cells. Clean data visualization heatmap style.
negative_prompt: 3D effects, inconsistent cell sizes, hard to read labels, too many colors, cluttered
